title: Ticket #2435: Extra copy of Globus 4 java files in release
description:
Many (possibly all) of our release files have two copies of the GRAM4 and GRAM4.2 java files, in lib/gt4[2] and lib/gt4[2]/gt4[2]-java. This is due to how the cmake rules install the files under the externals install tree.

The install command is cp -r gt4-java ${GT4_INSTALL_LOC}/lib/gt4. The expectation is that ${GT4_INSTALL_LOC}/lib/gt4 doesn't exist yet and will be created as part of the copy. If ${GT4_INSTALL_LOC}/lib/gt4 does exist (due to a previous build of the external), then you end up with a second copy of the directory tree of gt4-java inside ${GT4_INSTALL_LOC}/lib/gt4.
